Text:
Many thanks for helping to show everyone what a truly vile organisation this sect is.

Hopefully the Irish people will be able to embrace a secular, science based future and turn their backs on this hideous mumbo jumbo!

It's a shame that a lot of people still think they are "holy" or good in some way! Inquisition and crusades do not mean much for common people, so perhaps we can make them change their minds a little bit through another kind of emotion, through the horrible scenes of children being raped and abused by these men - with no divine punishment.

Thanks for uploading uploader :D 
Two thumbs up!
